name: Deckgeon
description:
Are you tired of RPG games for mobile phones with an unnatural control? Explore dungeons and fight with monsters using cards!

My last and most ambitious project started in 2018, working with a little dev team (3D designer and musician).
I published a beta, received feedback and currently I am developing new features. 

I hope to publish a new release this year!

Features

  • 10 levels
  • +15 different cards
  • Text in English and Spanish
